verses.verse: And David made <S%H6213><s%> him houses <S%H1004><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> and prepared <S%H3559><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> for the ark <S%H727><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and pitched <S%H5186><s%> for it a tent. <S%H168><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> None <S%H3808><s%> ought to carry <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> the Levites: <S%H3881><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> them hath the LORD <S%H3068><s%> chosen <S%H977><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and to minister <S%H8334><s%> unto him forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> gathered <S%H6950><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> together to <S%H413><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> to bring up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his place, <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had prepared <S%H3559><s%> for it.
And David <S%H1732><s%> assembled <S%H622><s%> <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and the Levites: <S%H3881><s%>
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath; <S%H6955><s%> Uriel <S%H222><s%> the chief, <S%H8269><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty: <S%H6242><s%>
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari; <S%H4847><s%> Asaiah <S%H6222><s%> the chief, <S%H8269><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty: <S%H6242><s%>
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershom; <S%H1648><s%> Joel <S%H3100><s%> the chief, <S%H8269><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty: <S%H7970><s%>
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elizaphan; <S%H469><s%> Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the chief, <S%H8269><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%> two hundred: <S%H3967><s%>
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hebron; <S%H2275><s%> Eliel <S%H447><s%> the chief, <S%H8269><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%> fourscore: <S%H8084><s%>
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziel; <S%H5816><s%> Amminadab <S%H5992><s%> the chief, <S%H8269><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twelve. <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for Zadok <S%H6659><s%> and Abiathar <S%H54><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> and for the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> for Uriel, <S%H222><s%> Asaiah, <S%H6222><s%> and Joel, <S%H3100><s%> Shemaiah, <S%H8098><s%> and Eliel, <S%H447><s%> and Amminadab, <S%H5992><s%>

And said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Ye <S%H859><s%> are the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the Levites: <S%H3881><s%> sanctify yourselves, <S%H6942><s%> both ye <S%H859><s%> and your brethren, <S%H251><s%> that ye may bring up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the place that I have prepared <S%H3559><s%> for it.

For because <S%H3588><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> did it not <S%H3808><s%> at the first, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7223><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> made a breach <S%H6555><s%> upon us, for <S%H3588><s%> that we sought <S%H1875><s%> him not <S%H3808><s%> after the due order. <S%H4941><s%>

So the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> sanctified themselves <S%H6942><s%> to bring up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> bore <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> upon their shoulders <S%H3802><s%> with the staves <S%H4133><s%> thereon, <S%H5921><s%> as <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to the chief <S%H8269><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> to appoint <S%H5975><s%> <S%H853><s%> their brethren <S%H251><s%> to be the singers <S%H7891><s%> with instruments <S%H3627><s%> of music, <S%H7892><s%> psalteries <S%H5035><s%> and harps <S%H3658><s%> and cymbals, <S%H4700><s%> sounding, <S%H8085><s%> by lifting up <S%H7311><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> with joy. <S%H8057><s%>

So the Levites <S%H3881><s%> appointed <S%H5975><s%> <S%H853><s%> Heman <S%H1968><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joel; <S%H3100><s%> and of <S%H4480><s%> his brethren, <S%H251><s%> Asaph <S%H623><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah; <S%H1296><s%> and of <S%H4480><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> their brethren, <S%H251><s%> Ethan <S%H387><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kushaiah; <S%H6984><s%>

And with <S%H5973><s%> them their brethren <S%H251><s%> of the second <S%H4932><s%> degree, Zechariah, <S%H2148><s%> Ben, <S%H1122><s%> and Jaaziel, <S%H3268><s%> and Shemiramoth, <S%H8070><s%> and Jehiel, <S%H3171><s%> and Unni, <S%H6042><s%> Eliab, <S%H446><s%> and Benaiah, <S%H1141><s%> and Maaseiah, <S%H4641><s%> and Mattithiah, <S%H4993><s%> and Elipheleh, <S%H466><s%> and Mikneiah, <S%H4737><s%> and Obed-edom, <S%H5654><s%> and Jeiel, <S%H3273><s%> the porters. <S%H7778><s%>
So the singers, <S%H7891><s%> Heman, <S%H1968><s%> Asaph, <S%H623><s%> and Ethan, <S%H387><s%> were appointed to sound <S%H8085><s%> with cymbals <S%H4700><s%> of brass; <S%H5178><s%>

And Zechariah, <S%H2148><s%> and Aziel, <S%H5815><s%> and Shemiramoth, <S%H8070><s%> and Jehiel, <S%H3171><s%> and Unni, <S%H6042><s%> and Eliab, <S%H446><s%> and Maaseiah, <S%H4641><s%> and Benaiah, <S%H1141><s%> with psalteries <S%H5035><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> Alamoth; <S%H5961><s%>

And Mattithiah, <S%H4993><s%> and Elipheleh, <S%H466><s%> and Mikneiah, <S%H4737><s%> and Obed-edom, <S%H5654><s%> and Jeiel, <S%H3273><s%> and Azaziah, <S%H5812><s%> with harps <S%H3658><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the Sheminith <S%H8067><s%> to excel. <S%H5329><s%>

And Chenaniah, <S%H3663><s%> chief <S%H8269><s%> of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> was for song: <S%H4853><s%> he instructed <S%H3256><s%> about the song, <S%H4853><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> was skillful. <S%H995><s%>
And Berechiah <S%H1296><s%> and Elkanah <S%H511><s%> were doorkeepers <S%H7778><s%> for the ark. <S%H727><s%>

And Shebaniah, <S%H7645><s%> and Jehoshaphat, <S%H3046><s%> and Nethaneel, <S%H5417><s%> and Amasai, <S%H6022><s%> and Zechariah, <S%H2148><s%> and Benaiah, <S%H1141><s%> and Eliezer, <S%H461><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> did blow <S%H2690><s%> with the trumpets <S%H2689><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of God: <S%H430><s%> and Obed-edom <S%H5654><s%> and Jehiah <S%H3174><s%> were doorkeepers <S%H7778><s%> for the ark. <S%H727><s%>

So <S%H1961><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and the captains <S%H8269><s%> over thousands, <S%H505><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to bring up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Obed-edom <S%H5654><s%> with joy. <S%H8057><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when God <S%H430><s%> helped <S%H5826><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> that bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that they offered <S%H2076><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> rams. <S%H352><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> was clothed <S%H3736><s%> with a robe <S%H4598><s%> of fine linen, <S%H948><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> that bore <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark, <S%H727><s%> and the singers, <S%H7891><s%> and Chenaniah <S%H3663><s%> the master <S%H8269><s%> of the song <S%H4853><s%> with the singers: <S%H7891><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> also had upon him an ephod <S%H646><s%> of linen. <S%H906><s%>

Thus all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> brought up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with shouting, <S%H8643><s%> and with sound <S%H6963><s%> of the cornet, <S%H7782><s%> and with trumpets, <S%H2689><s%> and with cymbals, <S%H4700><s%> making a noise <S%H8085><s%> with psalteries <S%H5035><s%> and harps. <S%H3658><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> as the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> that Michal <S%H4324><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> looking out <S%H8259><s%> at <S%H1157><s%> a window <S%H2474><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> dancing <S%H7540><s%> and playing: <S%H7832><s%> and she despised <S%H959><s%> him in her heart. <S%H3820><s%>
